text: jo log usake qaayal hain ki mariyam ke bete eesa maseeh khuda hain vah sab kaafir hain haaloki maseeh ne khud yoon kah diya tha ki ai banee isaraeel sirph usee khuda kee ibaadat karo jo hamaara aur tumhaara paalane vaala hai kyonki (yaad rakho) jisane khuda ka shareek banaaya us par khuda ne behisht ko haraam kar diya hai aur usaka thikaana jahannum hai aur zaalimon ka koee madadagaar nahin
